entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
